note.p: Education: Leeds Grammar School; Edinburgh University; Leyden University

Career: Joined the Prussian army as an Ensign; promoted to Captain; left the Prussian service to join an English regiment (1756); studied medicine; published many medical works; was sent to the United States by government, and was imprisoned; returned to England and received a pension
Notes: Note on certificate: 'Ballotted & Rejected 25 Feb 1768'
